messages.content: ComfyUI-NodePresets is an extension for ComfyUI that allows users to save and load node presets using the node's context menu.
How can you access a node's presets in ComfyUI-NodePresets?
To access a node's presets in ComfyUI-NodePresets, right-click on the node and choose 'Presets' from its context menu.
To install ComfyUI-NodePresets, clone the repository into your 'custom_nodes' folder using the command 'git clone https://github.com/BlakeOne/ComfyUI-NodePresets' and then reload ComfyUI.
Which ComfyUI extension is ComfyUI-NodePresets based on?
ComfyUI-NodePresets is based on ComfyUI's NodeTemplates extension.
What is the purpose of ComfyUI-NodePresets?
The purpose of ComfyUI-NodePresets is to provide an easy way to save and load node presets in ComfyUI, increasing efficiency and convenience for users.
Is ComfyUI-NodePresets an official ComfyUI extension?
No, ComfyUI-NodePresets is a custom extension created by a third-party developer.
Can ComfyUI-NodePresets be used without installing it in the 'custom_nodes' folder?
No, ComfyUI-NodePresets must be installed in the 'custom_nodes' folder to function properly within ComfyUI.
